p: LMH cells treated with caspase inhibitors or DMSO as a control were infected with FAdV4 at an multiplicity of infection (MOI) of 0.1, and cell cultures were collected at different time points (12, 24, 36, and 48 h) after infection, followed by titration using 50% tissue culture infective doses (TCID 50) as described previously [ 14]. Tissue culture wells with a cytopathic effect (CPE) were considered to be positive.
